fields.eventDescription: When a student has started to attempt a particular challenge
When a student has finished to attempt and has submitted a particular challenge
When a student completes answering a particular question in a particular challenge

fields.eventName: Instructor Entering Information for an Activity
fields.eventDescription: When an instructor enters some information for a particular activity
when certain period of time passes after starting an event
When the value of a particular variable in a particular challenge is changed
